description: Player training and development system with weekly practice focus, offseason development, and full XP system. Players earn XP from games/practice and can spend on attributes. AI teams use automatic progression based on age/potential.
goal: Add gameplay depth with meaningful player development decisions, realistic progression curves, and resource management through XP economy
requirements: XP earned from weekly practice sessions
Age-based progression curves (young grow, old decline)
constraints: Must use existing Player type interface
Must integrate with existing GM skills system
Must integrate with existing facilities system
